summary: Modified the masks for faces to be visible.
descriptionHtml:
Modified the masks for faces to be visible.

UPDATE: There is some voodoo going on with the biped tags - the modded mask does not work with the Archmage robes because it is hooded. Now masks and circlets should work with the Archrobes, but not helmets. The dpmasks currently tagged as a helmet because no other config works. 
If anyone has a solution to this please give me some info, its tricky ..



You need to activate the plugin in Data Files, otherwise it won\'t work. 

READ: (Beta) This mod does not work for Argonian and Kajiit races (and male orc). I only modified the mesh (and uv-map). The textures are untouched. No stats have been changed. This does also not work whith mods that modify the dragonpriestmasks stats, because the headmesh needed to be activated in the corresponding data.


This is a very rough version - I\'ll also look at the textures next because the original is not symmetric and thus I had to twist the uv-map a bit
author: koiwe
